bibl.title: Interpreting the Architecture of the temenos: Demotic Papyri and the Cult in Soknopaiou Nesos. Avec résumé en anglais.

series.title: Biblioteca degli "Studi di Egittologia e di Papirologia".

bibl.note: I. Papyri describing the temple's decoration. - II. Ritual texts from Soknopaiou Nesos. - III. Interpretation of the temple's architecture on the basis of the aforementioned texts. [Inv. ST05/256/1369. Demotic oracular question. Second half of the 1st century B.C.] - IV. The cult of Isis at Soknopaiou Nesos. - V. Conclusion.
bibl.seg: Stadler Martin Andreas, Interpreting the Architecture of the temenos: Demotic Papyri and the Cult in Soknopaiou Nesos. Avec résumé en anglais.
Mario Capasso e Paola Davoli (a cura di), Soknopaiou Nesos Project. I (2003-2009) = Biblioteca degli "Studi di Egittologia e di Papirologia". 9 (Pisa - Roma, 2012) pp. 379-386, 2 figg.
